comment: Is this supposed to be a 90 minute boil?  You have 60 min for the boil time, but the first batch of hops at 90 min.  Please let me know, I'm excited to try this out!
I think it was supposed to be a 60 min but we went to 90 min to boil down to what we wanted for our batch size. It came out quite good, but a 60 min would be just as fine.
